This game has its bugs and can be frustrating at times, but it's still a very fun and enjoyable.

This game is the embodiment of a love hate relationship. 

When talking about this there are a few things that come to my head.
>Beautiful Graphics
>Alright Lore
>Terrible Community
>Alright game play
>Not The Best Devs
The DBD community is the first issue and the is for both Killer and Survivor, you will find that doing close to anything in this game will get you cussed out, have death threats sent your way or have a ton of slurs used like nothing, finding nice people on this game has gotten harder and harder over the years.
I also brought up game play, The game play in this game is only okay. As someone with 1000 hours and has bought all the dlcs its a big regret for me, as most of the time, the survivor perks are bad and the game play of which survivor you pick isn't that much of an issue (Either way survivors practically only fun if you have friends) and for killer a lot of the killers are TERRIBLE, their powers can be original but they really match the desire to control a game, With thing like moris, keys and then clicking a flashlight every ten seconds they all add up into the game play which normally will end up with you complaining, ranting or just overall upset.

The Dev's are another problem, it feels like they rarely play their own game and they can seem really money hungry.
This game started fun but ended in what feels like a waste.

The grind in this game is complete bullshit. Letâ€™s say that you want to level up your newly bought character. Thatâ€™s great but remember that 1,000,000 bp only gets you to around 40 lvl while you without boosts earn max of 32,000 bloodpoints per killer game. Even if you played every match with bp boosts  you would propably die from sleep deprivation, because queuetimes are a complete joke. When you go to a match you will be greeted by a team of red/purple ranks and one poor rank 15-20 that just bought the game. Sorry for grammatical errors.

cool game made by developers that can't balance stuff that easily, matchmaking and the ranking system are just very all over the place, have to verify my files every time i boot it up as well as getting kicked from party's in the after game screen. Loop killer all game to get 1 hit downed by shitty perks and unbalanced killers, depip, but don't worry your teammates who didn't try to chase all game get out with no hits no hooks and no gens and pip up, meanwhile u did half the gens in the game and loop killer for 9 min straight....what does that equal a fucking depip. Coolest thing about this game is the collaborations. 6/10 game, devs just need to get their shit together with some of the Perks and Add-ons especially for killers. 

Just fix the game pls, i want to play it but sometimes its just broken.

it's not fun anymore, the MMR sucks, the people who play it have a shitty attitude 90% of the time.. i tried to enjoy it for so long and about two years ago i really did, none of my friends play it anymore i never have motivation to play this game specifically knowing my matches will without a doubt be shitty. i think i'm just gonna stop playing for a while. 
it did use to be fun, and it is fun to play with your friends.. maybe not on public matches anymore.

It would be great, if it wasn't JUST Nemesis, and zombies couldn't just down everybody while he sat AFK. So much fun. Especially when rank 1 killers are going against rank 20 survivors. Uninstalling until the devs get their heads out of their asses
